title: Genes influence human lifespan far more than thought, new study suggests
description: How big of a role do our genes play in our lifespan? Quite a bit more than previously thought, a new study suggests.
content: How big of a role do our genes play in our lifespan? Quite a bit more than previously thought, a new study suggests.
